de.tub.observer
Class Subject

java.lang.Object
  de.tub.observer.Subject
Direct Known Subclasses:
IterativeDirectoryReader, IterativeFileReader, TextFileLineReader, UserReader
public abstract class Subject
extends Object

This class is part of the Observer design pattern. It designs the subject which can be observed by multiple Observers.

Author:
Sebastian Oelke
See Also:
Observer

 boolean attach(Observer observer, Interests interest)

Constructor Detail

Subject

public Subject()
Method Detail

attach

public boolean attach(Observer observer,
                      Interests interest)
Attaches the given observer to the list of observers with the given interest. If the observer is null false is returned.

Parameters:
observer - the observer to attach.
interest - the observer is attached to the list of observers with this interest.
Returns:
true if the observer for the given interest was attached, otherwise false.

attach

public void attach(Observer observer,
                   Interests[] interests)
This is a convenience method to attach an observer to multiple interests at once. If the given observer or the interests are null or the interests array is empty this method returns without result.

Parameters:
observer - the observer to attach.
interests - the interests to which to attach with the observer.

detach

public boolean detach(Observer observer,
                      Interests interest)
Detaches the given observer from the list of observers attached with the given interest. If the observer is null or there are no observers with the given interest present false is returned. A value of true is returned if there was an observer for the given interest present before detaching it.

Parameters:
observer - the observer to detach.
interest - an observer attached with this interest is getting detached.
Returns:
true if there was an observer for the given interest present before detaching it, otherwise false.

notifyObservers

public void notifyObservers(Interests interest,
                            Object arg)
Notifies all observers that are attached at this subject with the given interest. If there are no observers attached with the given interest this method returns with no result.

Parameters:
interest - observers attached with this interest are notified.
arg - an argument passed to the observers.
